Question
====
Which muscle fiber type is most resistant to fatigue?

Answerlist
----
* Type I
* Type IIA
* Type IIB
* Fast glycolytic
* Type IIx

Solution
====
Type I fibers are slow-twitch, rich in mitochondria and myoglobin, and rely on aerobic metabolism, making them highly resistant to fatigue.
